definition: to cooperate
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
variant of 合[he2]
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together

sentences.english: Shared laughter creates a bond of friendships.
sentences.chinese: 分享欢笑创造友谊的结合力。

sentences.english: Iron at temperatures close to and above its critical temperature has an affinity for carbon.
sentences.chinese: 铁在靠近并高于其临界温度时对碳具有亲合力。

sentences.english: The explicit expressions of free surface and resultant forces imposing on the rotor are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 求得了自由面和作用在转子上的合力的显式表达式。

sentences.english: Conclusion Affinity maturation might have been completed by the time that patients presented with anti-GBM disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论起病时抗GBM抗体的亲合力成熟过程已经完成。

sentences.english: Second, build the cloud center for enterprises and encourage the cloud service for enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 二是建设企业云中心，合力推动企业云服务。

sentences.english: It may raise the strength of the coarse grained soil.
sentences.chinese: 由于咬合力的存在，使粗粒土的强度大幅度提高。

sentences.english: As they work to stop the plague from spreading, Tarrou and Dr. Rieux become good friends.
sentences.chinese: 塔鲁和李欧医生也在合力阻止瘟疫扩散中结为好友。

sentences.english: Generalcombining ability more accessible with sowing-season than special combining ability.
sentences.chinese: 一般配合力较特殊配合力更易受播期效应影响。

sentences.english: Generalcombining ability more accessible with sowing-season than special combining ability.
sentences.chinese: 一般配合力较特殊配合力更易受播期效应影响。

sentences.english: This paper proposed the quantitative relationship between electron affinity and induced effect.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了电子亲合力与诱导效应之间的定量关系。

sentences.english: China should act expeditiously to correct the social and legal pressures that have converged to create this problem.
sentences.chinese: 中国应该迅速纠正造成这一问题的社会和法律合力。

sentences.english: The combining ability is important parameter of breeding on high photosynthesis hybrid pepper varieties.
sentences.chinese: 配合力是选育强光合杂交辣椒品种的重要参数。

sentences.english: Objective To compare three measurement methods of TIBC in serum.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较三种总铁结合力测定方法。

sentences.english: It will also form our affinity and brand association.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以形成我们的品牌亲合力与凝聚力。

sentences.english: Fourth, sound defense and an investigation mechanism, enhance law enforcement efforts.
sentences.chinese: 四是健全联防协查机制，增强执法合力。

sentences.english: However, the iron chelating ability of all samples including BHT and vitamin C were lower than 70%.
sentences.chinese: 但是所有样品对二价铁离子络合力均较低。

definition: lit. to join hands/to act together
to work with a common purpose (idiom); to make concerted efforts/to pull together/to work as one
to work as one (idiom); united in a concerted effort/working hard together
to join forces/to give full cooperation
to cooperate/in coordination with/coordinated/collaborate/collaboration/collaborative
with all one's strength/full strength/all-out (effort)/fully (support)
to work together/to collaborate
to do everything one can/to spare no effort/to strive
to go forward together (idiom); to undertake simultaneous tasks/going hand in hand
to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
a move/an action/in one move/at a stroke/in one go
to draw support from/with the help of
a helping hand/help/assistance
powerful
common/joint/jointly/together/collaborative
(honorific) your kind efforts/thanks to your help
